insert_channel {"id": 1, "user_id": 1, "name": "foobar", "prefix": "+", "bot_name": "hortbot", "active": true}

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :+testing_error
no_send

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :+command add pan FOUND THE (_PARAMETER_CAPS_), HAVE YE?
send hortbot #foobar [HB] command pan added, restricted to subscribers and above

# Good message, for reference:
# handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :+pan working command

handle hortbot PRIVMSG #foobar :+pan working command
no_send

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG # :+pan working command
no_send

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG :+pan working command
no_send

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__ :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :+pan working command
no_send

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv WHAT #foobar :+pan working command
no_send

handle hortbot @id=;room-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :+pan working command
no_send

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id= :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :+pan working command
no_send

no_send
